runs.comm: lovely start for Nehra. Full and swinging in prodigiously towards middle stump. Comes back in late. Chandi pushes to mid-on, played that nicely
superb shot. Dispatched with disdain. Full and wide, this time not as much swing. Chandimal stays in his crease, opens his stance and drives uppishly in the gap at cover.
full again but closer to off stump. Enough inward movement, and Chandimal squeezes a drive to extra cover
first change in length of the day. A good length on off, tight lines. Chandimal is forced to defend watchfully
beauty. Full on off, comes back in to Chandimal late again. A thick inside edge onto pad saves Chandimal despite Nehra's optimistic appeal
good end to the over. Full on off at 138 kph. Chandimal defends under his eyes, to mid-off
good length. Fullish and ducking back into off. Dilshan stays in his crease and forces a push to point
yikes. Exuberant. A shimmy down before Bumrah delivers. Advances and gets a good length delivery on off, Dilshan tries to hoick it over square leg but only taps it towards him for a quick single
better from Chandimal. Full on off, drives to mid-off
back of a length outside off, width on offer but the away movement takes the ball past Chandimal's flaying bat. Was there to be hit though
Chandi shimmies down now, full length outside off. Chandimal comes down and tries to steer to third man but misses
back of a length, shaping back in to Chandimal who is late on his flick and is struck on the thigh pad. Back to back tight overs from the bowlers
too straight and clipped away easily wide of short fine leg but Ashwin puts in a good diving stop to prevent it from going through

gone. Chandimal's exuberant slog doesn't work. Nehra bangs it on a good length on leg, Chandimal backs away and comes down, looking to go over midwicket but gets a thin inside edge on its way to the keeper. Had he stayed in his normal stance, it would have been a bad ball on his hips with short fine leg up but Chandimal looked to go hard and pays the price.
good run that. Good length on off, a hint of away shape. Pushes towards mid-off and calls for the run immediately.
straight on middle, worked away towards square leg for a run
good length outside off, Jayasuriya tries to go through the off side but adjusts late to pat towards cover. Feet away from the ball.
good shot and good fielding too. Full on off and Jayasuriya dances down to drive back powerfully towards Nehra who sticks out his right hand to half-stop it.
full on middle, pushed away towards mid-on for another good single. Looked to go big but the ball wasn't there and picked one of it. Well done

not quite the dilscoop but the improvisation earns him four. Gets down early and sweeps the ball fine, past a diving Dhawan at short fine leg. Didn't get under it to go over the keeper but some good adjustment again.

straight down short fine leg's throat but the fielder isn't there anymore. Back of a length delivery on leg, Dilshan is early on the pull but the ball lobs up off the thigh pad/back of the bat to fine leg

late appeal and gone. Terrific delivery that, Dhoni collects and belatedly appeals. Good length, top-of-off. Jayasuriya pokes at it away from his body and gets the thinnest of snicks through to the keeper. Audible sound and given. Could have only been the bat
oh yes. What a jaffa. Good length, from wide of the crease, honing in on off stump. Kapugedara has a poke and is convincingly beaten by away movement
and again. Wow. Length outside off, Kapu is beaten by some outswing again.
full on off, driven back to the bowler
slower ball but drifts down leg, wide.
nice and full again at 138 kph. On off and Dilshan drives towards cover from the crease
back of a length, down leg. Another wide. Started this inswinger too straight
big appeal but the impact was clearly outside off. Full, outside off, Dilshan gets down low for another sweep but misses and is rapped on the pads. Easy call
back of a length on off, nudged towards mid-on for a quick single.

much better appeal, but not given. Very full on leg, pitched in line and strikes Kapu in front of leg. The slip fielder throws at the stumps but misses and concedes three overthrows. Replays show that was out.
good length on middle and leg, clipped with the swing towards mid-on for a run to keep strike

poor delivery and Dilshan punishes him. Length delivery but sliding down leg, Dilshan helps it on its way towards fine leg where Dhawan does well to get around and stop it, but the ball trickles away to the fence
yorker on off, nudged with soft hands towards square leg. Dilshan comes back for the second, good stuff.
low full toss on middle, bunted down towards mid-on for one.
another good single. tapped down towards backward point where Jadeja is lurking. Dilshan makes it easily despite a lovely pick-up and throw
good length on middle and leg, nurdled away towards deep square leg
how did that miss off stump? Speared in the blockhole, just outside off and Kapugedara misses it.
taken. The big wicket of Dilshan. Pandya strikes with his first ball. A well-directed bouncer on middle and Dilshan pulls, but fails to keep it down. Goes straight down Ashwin's throat at fine leg.
full outside off, overpitched. Drilled to cover

where was Kapugedara going? back of a length on off, Mathews defends it towards the bowler, and calls for a run before saying no. Kapu is halfway down and has to return but the throw misses the stumps by Pandya.
back of a length on off, calmly defended
another full delivery on off, squirted away towards Jadeja at point. Clearly no run there either
awkwardly dabbed down to third man after a shimmy down the track. Mathews not looking particularly graceful so far
Yuvi starts with a shortish delivery outside off, mathews is late on the cut and misses
some flight on off, no turn. Off the inside half of the bat to long-off
beautiful bowling. Tossed up but very wide outside off, Kapu goes for an expanisve slog over cover but misses
some more flight outside off, drilled away to the sweeper cover
flatter outside off, pushed towards long-off. Yuvraj gets down lazily and lets it through.
another big shot. Flighted on off, Kapugedara goes for a big heave but inside-edges onto his boot. No turn
good length on middle and leg, skids on to Mathews who tickles his nudge to square leg
nicely played. Beautiful touch. Good length outside off, Kapugedara opens the face and guides it wide of slip and to the third man boundary. Wonderful execution
tapped top point again. Jadeja sprints to it and collects, forcing Mathews to yell "no"
nice stroke. Back of a length on middle, pulled emphatically to square leg. Just the one
another beauty. Fullish length outside off, the ball deviates past Mathews' outside edge
lovely delivery. Full on off, moves away from Mathews late, who is squared up while playing his flick. The bowler fields.
flat on off, punched off the back foot to the sweeper cover
some flight and some spin. On off and Mathews skews to point
splendid bowling. Slowed up on middle and the ball takes the outside half of the bat to point
shot of the day. Mathews backs away, picks his spot and launches the straight loft right over the bowler's head. Great execution despite not getting it off the sweetspot
worked away towards midwicket
flight on off, driven away to cover.
smashed. runs down to the pitch and bludgeons a length delivery past wide mid-on for four. Good intent and execution from Mathews so far
back of a length on middle and leg, 142 kph. Hustles Mathews a bit for pace, whipped to fine leg
short delivery outside off at 136 kph. Good direction that, forcing Kapu to drag the pull if he wanted to play, but the batsman lets it be
absolutely whacked away to Yuvraj at the sweeper cover. Length outside off and belted from the crease
superb stroke. Targeted his area and some more fine execution. Full outside off, Mathews shuffles across and pulls between midwicket and mid-on.

big big wicket this. Full outside off, Mathews brings an angled bat down late and gets a thick inside edge which clatters into the stumps. The crucial wicket of Mathews just when he was looking to explode. How much will that effect SL?
flight outside off, driven to long-off
flight, loop and drift on leg stump. Off the pad towards fine leg for a single
81 kph, tossed up outside off. In the slot and Kapugedara goes for it but fails to connect. Extra bounce
carrom ball but down leg, wide
slightly short and Kapu jumps back to pummel a pull to midwicket
lots of flight, ends up overpitched. Worked away to deep midwicket
short, outside off, Kapu tries an cheeky steer but misses.
flat on off, defended
tired of the blocking, Siriwardana launches one straight back over the bowler's head. Terrific timing, and a great spot in the field. Big hit that
beautiful. Anticipated the dart from Jadeja, stayed back and just deflected the ball late towards third man for four
flat on leg, clipped to midwicket. Great batting this
shorter and slower on middle, worked away quietly towards square leg. Clever
flat on off, pulled late to deep midwicket. 13 off the over
Raina starts off with some flight on leg, driven to long-off with the little bit of turn
he won't have to bowling with like that. Fired in down leg, Kapu just swivels this to the backward square leg boundary. Riskless boundary
ooh, flat on off, Kapu goes for the big slog but gets a thin inside edge which just evades the leg stump
flat on middle, looking for the single but pushes it back
quick run. Nudged to midwicket, who misfields. No overthrow though
splendid fielding from Jadeja. Slogged away with the angle to wide long-on. Jadeja sprints around, hauls it in, turns around and fires a throw to Raina on the full. Saved two.
flat on leg, pings off the pad after missing the bat
high in the air but safe. tossed up on middle, Siriwardana gets down for a sweep but the ball spoons up off the top edge and falls right in the gap at square leg
darted in on leg, clipped to deep square leg
lovely shot selection. Ashwin anticipating the cross-batted slog drops it short outside off. Kapu keeps his shape and forehand-slaps it over cover
carrom ball outside off, Kapu misses a heave this time
another carrom ball outside off, Kapu tries a reverse sweep but fails to connect. good comeback from Ashwin.
good length on off, steered away to point for one
back of a length on middle, the pull is off the top half of the bat to Ashwin at midwicket who hits the stumps at the non-strikers end and conceded the extra
driven away to long-off
shortish delivery on middle and Siriwardana stays back to launch a pull in the gap at midwicket. Plonked in no-man's land, Kohli loses his footing but keeps em down to two
fullish delivery on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket. Just the one
wide off point for a couple. backed away and scythed a cut past point. Kohli does well to return a throw on the full but the batsmen sprint two.
taken. Tossed up on off, Siriwardana clears one foot and launches it high in the air towards long-on where Raina settles under it to take an easy catch.
flat on middle and leg, worked away to deep midwicket
Ashwin goes wider of the crease and bowls it with a flat trajectory on off, pushed back
flat down leg, swept powerfully but on the bounce to deep square leg
carrom ball on middle and leg, nudged to deep midwicket
no-ball from Ashwin. Flat on middle and leg, Shanka defends. Marginal call
low full toss on middle, slogged away to midwicket. And that looks out. Rohit returns a good throw and Shanaka is well short. Out of a free hit. What a way to go. Well done by Rohit too
excellent yorker on off, pushed back to the bowler who sloppily misfields and allows one

taken. Wow, what sweet timing, but he has picked out sweeper cover to perfection. Full delivery outside off, Kapugedara smashes an inside-out drive with amazing timing and it carries to Pandya at sweeper cover who takes a really good catch, backtracking.
that is power. Full delivery on off, shaping away. Perera clears one foot and muscles a drive to the long-off boundary. Crucial
another boundary. Slower ball this time on middle and Perera pulls powerfully in the gap at midwicket.
well bowled. Low full toss on off, Perera drills a drive to long-off. Not much he could do with that actually
shortish delivery on middle, pulled away with awful timing to midwicket.
cracked away to deep midwicket. Slow and Kulasekara got down low to sweep powerfully
phew, that is massive. Perera uses all his power after getting close enough to the pitch with a  shimmy. Ashwin tosses it up but Perera comes down and slogs it away over midwicket. Gigantic
very wide outside off, Perera made the mistake of giving himself a bit of room. He toe-ended in the air towards deep cover for one
slower on middle and leg, Kulasekara misses his sweep but they sprint a leg bye

lovely bowling. Sees Perera advancing and bowls it very slow but very wide outside off. So wide that it is called a wide. Perera comes down but fails to connect with a big heave, wrong shot selection to that ball. But Dhoni whips off the bails in a jiffy and the umpire doesn't need the help of his upstairs colleague.
legspinner outside off, worked away to deep midwicket
full delivery on middle, off the leading edge towards cover
low full toss outside off, off the edge towards third man for a run.
another full delivery on middle, off the edge towards third man for another run
shot. Picked his spot and executed well. Got a low full toss which aided and abetted him. Kulasekara slogs it away over midwicket. Well played
oh lovely. Another low full toss outside off, Kulasekara bends his knees, gets under it and hits it beautifully over cover for four. On the bounce
slower ball outside off, Kulasekara misses. Looked like a wide but not called. Hmm, interesting
smashed away towards deep midwicket. Full toss on middle and Kulasekara slogs it away to deep midwicket. The throw is quick and Dhoni takes off the bails again. This time, Kulasekara is well out.
